content.detailedDescription: Sphere shape shining like liquid mercury at times black, hovering, about 10 minutes and disappeared into clouds.  i was in grundy center and it was ne in the distance.  i was watching the clouds coming in from the north.  noticed a shining metal sphere appeared bright silver and pivoted at times and appeared solid black then pivoted again and silver.  hovered in place with eventual slight movement east and hovered more then disappeared into clouds after i watched for about 10 minutes.  my thoughts were, "i know you are there and i want to know more about you"  this is the first time i have ever seen anything like this.
content.summary: Sphere shape shining like liquid mercury at times black, hovering, about 10 minutes and disappeared into clouds

content.detailedDescription:
In april of 2012, i was leaving a hair salon and i looked up at the sky. it was a beautiful, clear, blue sky day. i had seen unconventional aircraft in the general area in sept 2011 on two occasions (case study 40801 & 40802) so i definitely made sure to check the sky on a routine basis in case i might see unconventional craft in the area again. when i looked up, i saw what appeared to be 10 silvery white objects flying in formation. they were too high in altitude for me to see their shape clearly, but the general shape would be that of a fat, almost crescent shaped,chevron.
i assumed they were seagulls. i decided to watch them longer and i noticed there was no wing strokes or any means of propulsion that i normally observed when viewing flying seagull and egrets frequently in the area.  then 3 of the objects became entirely stationary and hovered, while two of the other objects reversed direction, and then took up position by two of the other unidentified objects they had been flying in front of. 
i then saw one of the other objects reverse and fly directly at one of the objects that was flying behind it but they did not collide, and instead the object that had reversed passed under the other object and continued in its reversed direction.  i realized one of them must have been of course at a slightly lower altitude to successfully complete that very, very unusual maneuver. the reversed object then reversed direction again and proceeded to head in its original direction heading towards the east. i will add that the reversal of direction was entirely effortless and the objects that i had seen reverse direction could do so without having to make a wide arc like a normal aircraft.
the 10 objects proceeded to fly in a eastern direction, very close in their flight path to where i had the two other sightings in the area in sept 2011. these definitely were not conventionally known aircraft, though they certainly could be drones or some other type of covert terrestrial craft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 10 silvery white objects, unconventional maneuvers

content.detailedDescription: This is a very similar sighting to one i had had earlier in sept 2011, which i have now reported and it is case study 40801.  i was in the same general slightly rural area, it was a little past 1pm approximately, and as i was leaving a store and heading to my car  i looked up at the sky and i saw two silvery white, solid, perfectly crescent shaped craft heading from east to west, on the same exact flight path as i had seen them eventually take on my prior sept 2011 sighting.  they flew very close to each other in tight formation, one craft slightly behind the other craft and they did not waver from their flight path whatsoever. i watched them until they flew out of my visual range.
content.summary: Two silver crescents again in southern california, daylight sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out of the post office in a somewhat rural neighborhood at around noon, and it was a bright clear day with a blue sky and no visible clouds.  as i walked to my car, i looked up and saw what i assumed were just two small, silvery-white planes heading from the west towards the east. then i saw them change direction rather randomly several times. 
both of the craft were able to hover and then move to left or right easily, unlike anything i have ever seen. seeing their unconventional abilities, i took out my cellphone and took a picture of them but they were too far away, and on the picture they only showed up as two very small silver blurs.
after viewing them for about 2 to 3 minutes approximately, a commercial airline passed over them, and it was at a higher altitude then the two  unidentified crafts.  i noticed that the two crafts where much smaller than the plane, each being only about a third as big as the commercial plane.  after approximately 1 to 2 more minutes of watching them do unconventional changes in direction, they both proceeded to head due east, and they flew directly over my head. i was then able to clearly confirm that they were both entirely solid, silvery white in color, perfectly crescent shaped craft that looked like they were made out of metal, and they seemed to be flying slightly faster than the typical small plane i have seen from time to time in the same area. they were definitely not conventional craft, but perhaps military drones or other such terrestrial craft that is still covert, or perhaps they are alien in origin.
content.summary: 2 silver crescent shaped craft over southern california, sept 2011

content.detailedDescription: Same as above
content.summary: I saw a triangle with perimeter lights sitting in bader field coming from noth to south moving slowly about 10 oclock in the nite sky, it was moving very slow and stopped behind a translucnet cloud and the lights went out and i couldnt see it anymore

content.detailedDescription: Went to bed around 1030 p.M. and i couldnt go to sleep so i stayed up watching the simpsons and all the sudden i heard some huming sound from outside in my front yard, so i looked out my window and saw this disk shaped object just hovering across the street then hover near my house. all the sudden my t.V. started acting weird and my phone and i-pod shut off. couldnt get them back on until the next morning. i did get a drawing of it though, as i went outside in my back yard, i saw the object just hovering over my house, red lights circling around the craft, and about twenty windows. watched it for about twenty minutes and it just hovered off like it took hyperspace.
content.summary: Ufo hovered over my hourse at around midnight for about 20 minutes then pass.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 1130 at night i observed a fast moving object with my night vision monucular at about  60 degrees above the horizon just above ursa major. i filmed the episode on a cheap portable dvr for about 5 seconds until i lost it. i was on my balcony in the heart of yaletown, vancouver, there were no clouds or airplanes in the vicinity or anything observable with the naked eye except a few stars. i was hoping to view a sateliite, which i did moments before ( also filmed) or at least it looked like one. when i first noticed the fast moving object, i thought it was a meteor but it soon changed direction moving from right to left then it immediately when straight down, lost it for a second and then it immediately when straight up but slow down, twirled like a toy and then picked up speed until i lost it...Really have no idea what this could be ..No way it is a bird or any land object due to the monucular was focused to the stars at 5x power, a bug or bat would not be observed due to the size. i would love answers!!
i have a 5 sec video but on mp4 format 11mb and can't attach as too big unless i figure a way to compress..Please contact me and i can send via email.
thank you
charles
content.summary: Night vision monucular capture extremely fast star or meteor like object changing multiple direction,

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin and i, were sitting on my front porch. we looked directly in front of us and up and we saw 2 very bright lights as if a plane was approaching. but then we noticed that it was flying sideways and not towards us. i immediately recognized that it was not an air craft because it did not have the blinking lights on it. it was very bright and weird looking. it looked like a train car flying through the air with two big windows on the side. this is where the two lights were coming from. it moved swiftly but not "whoosh" like. it was faster than a plane though. it flew silently by us and we tried to get it on video but my phone was not picking it up. it was in our visual sight for about five minutes. immediately after that a plane flew by, very very high in the air but we could see the flashing lights on it. right after that a military jet, solid black, it looked like a stealth bomber, flew over us and turned around as if it was chasing the boxcar shaped object. the jet also had flashing red, white and blue lights on it. i have never seen a stealth bomber in person so i cannot describe them but i think that is what the jet was. i have never seen anything like this before, it was weird and creepy but very exciting because now i am a complete believer!!!!

thanks guys and keep up the good work!

amber n. stewart
content.summary: To me it resembled a train boxcar flying across the sky. it did not fly very fast but it was flying faster than an airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
The sun was beginning to go down and i was outside with my cousins taking videos of various things like cars passing by and each other, when one of my cousins noticed a dark spinning object moving quickly from southwest to northeast.

one of my other cousins had the video camera and started to take the video. before we started recording the object was spinning, but stopped right about the time he started filming. there was no sound, and we did not see any clouds, planes, or other objects in the sky at this time.

one of my cousins thought it might be a balloon, but me and my other cousin did not think it was a balloon. it was a warm day and there was no wind, so if it was a balloon i don't think it would be moving that fast and straight. we watched the object until it disappeared over the tree line.
content.summary: Saw a spinning dark object moving quickly across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Driving at night on salisbury street headed northbound towards dededo from harmon loop elementary school. speed approx 30-35 mph. visibility clear, slight over cast but none during sighting. car windows are tinted but rolled down window, observing while at stop light. what got my attention was its color, decent (slow), the fact that there was two of them mirroring each other up until once started circling the other. before the other circled its partner in a slow manner, the gap between the two fluctuated. gradually increasing and decreasing at a relatively slow speed.

i don't know what to make of it but relate it to the solar flare event that took place last week?

i worked in aviation for 6 years and have a degree in the field. so i know of the kind of lights, colors, and or sounds were applicable.
content.summary: Anybody but me see those two orange lights above guam (dededo) circling for a good 7 minutes then disappear? one stationary as if sinking and the other circling the other towards the latter half of decent? no particular flight path, thier distances betwee

content.detailedDescription: I heard fireworks going off outside so i went out around 9:30 or 9:45. i walked to the top of my yard becauce i could see a strange light coming over the mountains in the middle of mifflin. it looked like it was spinning, so i ran inside to get my binoculars. the strap for them was tangled up with some wires so i brought everything out with it. the light had started to the left of me but by now like a minute later it was almost directly in front of me over the mountain ridge across town like a mile or so away by now with the binoculars i could see it very clearly and within a very short moment it shot off in a steak. i didn't think i would see anything after that but i was pretty stunned so i stood there and in like a minute another one came from exactly the same place and followed the very bottom edge of the clouds. they kept appearing the same amount of time appart and went exactly the same way. i was so excited i lost count of them, but there were at least 7 to 8 that i saw. they all looked the same darkened disk shapes with 1 big light in the center and 3 smaller ones in a triangle formation aroud it with curved lines of light between the 3 outer lights, but not connecting them. the lights were pulsating and sort of like flashing, it reminded me o it f 1 of those old simon says games floating upside down. i am partialy color blind so i don't know what colors it had,but there were a few different ones for sure. i have a friend that saw 1 of them the first night for about 45 minutes and also saw them on the 4 and the 5th and 6th too. i am twenty eight and i have seen these lights around h,like probably just a couple of hundredere before,but never more than 1 at a time. about a hlf an hour later i heard a double prop helicopter flying the same direction as the crafts e arlier. i knew it was that kind of helicopter because black ones fly over my house alot,really low, maybe a couple hundred feet all black nothing on them. i would like to hear back from you if anyone else has reported this event or if you need any additional info. and only 2 of them sreaked off the others just blinked ouy. it was some crazy lookink stuff thats for sure. i don't know how to send drawing sorry but have 1 made.
content.summary: Pulsating l ights3 intriangle 1 much bigger in middleother people saw it too color blind so don<t know colors came next 2 hights alot of planes like 10  were flying atfer 1st night with double prop helicopters have more imformation call if needed

content.detailedDescription: It was approx 10:25pm on july 13th 2012. i was returning home from work and was traveling an everyday road as i am extremely familiar with the area. it was dark as it seemed to have cloud cover as you can tell by the town lights. i was driving south bound and just drove over a hill where i noticed a strange light in the sky just to the right of me. immediately i thought to myself "there's no cell tower there? what is that?"... i slowed down to look at this light which didn't seem that high over the treeline that it was hovering. it appeared to be maybe 200 ft over the tree lines. as i was driving a little closer to the light, it looked to me to have 2 colors. the top of the light was reddish/orange and the bottom was more of a whitish light. almost as if two in one. but the light was strange in the fact that the light was more of a candle light warmth color. as i'm slowly driving past watching this light (and it's still to the right of me). i noticed another car just sitting watching this thing as well. i continued to drive slowly then decide to turn around to continue to watch this thing so i turned into a driveway area within 10 sec.. turned around and now the light had moved westward about 2000 ft. i thought to myself, "that light couldn't have been that far away in the distance." the light hovered there for a while, then i noticed the suv that was parked decided to take off from watching it pretty quickly. i could tell it was a woman as she drove past me and she appeared to look bothered. i turned back to watch this hovering orb and within a split second or millisecond and at an unimaginable speed, i watched this thing zoom off northwest. i drove home very upset as to what i witnessed as well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red/white orb hovering over trees,then took off

content.detailedDescription:
I had just taken my dogs out to do their business and come back in the house. i was about to lay back down in bed but saw this light in the sky outside of my bedroom window.
at first i thought it was a plane but it remained stationary  and i watched the brightness of the object changed from an intense white to a kind of bluish white then red and just slowly dim out. i awakened my wife who also saw the object before it dimmed out.
content.summary: Starlike object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I live in the hayward hills, i have a view overlooking the city. i often leave my curtain open at night to see the light's of the city. i was about to go to bed when i noticed a strange glowing light hoover in one place far above the city. i originally thought it was a helicopter but i noticed it stayed perfectly still as the light coming from it began to brighten. from the elevation above the city it was pretty clearly not a helicopter to me because there would be no way the light would reach the area below. it stayed in spot for about a couple minutes and the light appeared to slowly dissipate to where i almost couldnt see it anymore, and then it in a split second appeared far brighter than it had been originally and what ever it was shot upwards at an amazing high rate of speed i have seen any helicopter ever be able to move any where close to the speed it reached as it shot up.
content.summary: Strange glowing light that rapidly flew up words

content.detailedDescription:
September 19th, 2011
7:45 pm
arkansas hwy 167 in camden, ar 

black triangle ufo with many little red, green, and blue colored lights  and two rectangular  pulsating light panels with light from pale yellowish to bright white pulsations. 

craft hovering and moving slowly at about two to three miles per hour in a stright line path headed south above tree tops about 200 feet 
over the ground. could see the craft in great detail. silent. crossing the hwy at a diagonal just inbetween the newly built sherrif's complex and a business called steel deals, metal sales yard and building. 

headed north in my vehicle into camden, ar just past the railroad tracks where they cross hwy 167, i saw a light in the distance just over the tree tops flashing colors

there are cell towers that have white flashing lights as you approach this area and as i noticed this light flashing different colors that caught my attention. in the distance it looked like a tower light except as i got closer to where i would see it directly overhead the size was getting larger while the tower lights remained normal size.

 there was absolutely no sound. the other traffic did not seem to notice the craft or at least i was the only one stopped and looking at it from the side of the road.

the panels went from steady bright/dim pulses to getting real bright. like it was powering up. it then took off at breakneck speed headed south, where it was seen  by  another witness 15 miles from where i saw it in a community called frenchport, ar.

i found this out later when a friend told me that he was talking to someone on the phone in frenchport who discribed the dame craft at the same time. so it went 15 miles in an instant. see drawing attached
then, just as i got to where the sherrif's complex is on the right, and steel deals on the left, i pulled over on the shoulder and put my vehicle in park and rolled the window down. i was awe stricken as i watched this craft that was lit up like a christmas tree float silently and pass directly overhead so close that i could see the roundness of each little colored light which were grouped in sections all along the underbelly of the triangle ufo.

in the midsection were two pulsating
content.summary: Triangle ufo seen up close in great detail.

content.detailedDescription: First i was whit my family at my sister nlaw's house in tonopa arizona having  fun talking to my mother n-law when i sow a bright light in the sky thinking is a meteor but when i sow it descending slow i took my camera and star filming and got the closes and my surprise was the bright light in the meddle and lights around it going of and on
content.summary: A really bright light in the sky and a descending slow

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from niagara falls, just turning onto glendale ave. when the cd player was affected and skipped.  as we turned onto glendale ave. the object proceeded to go over the car. i was driving while my wife and child were watching the object.  it then disappeared almost right after it had gone over the car as i was driving down glendale ave.
content.summary: Witnessed bright white lights

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from niagara falls, from the street which is niagara parkway, then turned down glendale ave.  observed the object before glendale in the sky off in the distance, a very distinctive bright white lights.  it affected the radio, or cd player anyway.  it proceeded a straight path over the car as i turned down glendale, the object was heading towards niagara falls.  then when the object got over us and past us on the other side of the car, it either simply disappeared, or somehow shadowed itself so it wouldn't be seen.  at first i thought it was a jet.

when the object affected the cd, my wife was mad that her cd the one that never skips, was skipping now.  we both saw it but we didn't have any bad feelings about it.  i lost sight of it because i think it either flew fast towards niagara falls, or it just simply disappeared.
content.summary: A triangle shape with bright white lights

content.detailedDescription: Went out back to let the dog out and saw a red orb starlight object dip down diagonally to the left and then back up to the right, then fade away. it moved slowly but wasn't consistent in speed. lasted about 10 seconds. you know when you see something straight. you know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red orb / starlight dipped diagonally, back up & faded away

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming the sunset and after i uploaded and viewed the film i noticed that i had captured the orb on film. 
i have the video that shows actual footage and immediately following i've enhanced the footage.
content.summary: Discovered orb on film of sunset

content.detailedDescription:
In roughly september of 2000 my cousin and i were sitting in my car which was stationary, parked with all lights and power off watching the lights of planes from the south 5 miles away move along the horizon and disappear to the eastern horizon. all planes had flashing indicator lights and produced sound except for one which was by itself and approached much closer at about 1-2 miles toward the horizon. the object moved very slowly at about 20-30 miles per hour and had a bright fixed headlight like a searchlight, but made no sound, had no blinking indicator lights and had no visible outline even as it approached 500 feet maximum from our position. when the object was directly in front still at 500 feet maximum and above a field at altitude of no more than 200 feet, i jokingly told my cousin "watch this" and flashed my headlights which were off . within 1-2 seconds of flashing my headlights the object which had no visible lights except the spotlight suddenly illuminated us with a staggered row of colored lights. after 5 seconds the lights completely turned off and the object which was almost completely in a hover, changed course and moved slowly and silently away from us and toward the treeline. there were no other lights from the object and it slowly disappeared into the night without a sound. 

additionally my friend who had stayed in a cabin on the opposite side of the hill years before had been awakened one night by lights outside the cabin with tremendous shaking of the structure. he who was a brave and courageous individual whom i never saw afraid said he was mortally terrified as he hid in a ball from the object and event taking place. 

thank you for your time, the experience still captivates and haunts me.
content.summary: Silent ufo approached, i flashed headlights, object turned on bright multicolored lights directly at us, then turned off and slowly drifted away.

content.detailedDescription: My grandson called me and told me to look at the sky towards the south. i looked up and saw at least 8 red-orange objects that looked like stars or bright planets. they were moving at a brisk pace. they changed paths,directions, and 1 changed shape so it looked like a red centered clear globe. some formed an l or v shaped pattern depending on one's viewing angle. then they continued in a northwesterly direction and disappeared. i wasn't sure what they were. i thought aircraft but they were silent and changed formations too quickly. i came in and did a search for red lights over texas and saw that there had been similar sightings in the southern part of the state. i felt that they were very extraordinary. earlier in the afternoon, the city of bonham experienced cellphone outages, atm problems, and difficulty accessing the internet.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red-orange star-like objects over fannin county, tx

content.detailedDescription: At approx 10:25pm (tonight 7/13/2012), i was coming home from work. i was travelling south bound on a well known road that i drive everyday. by this time, it was darker than normal possibly due to cloud cover. i was driving over a hill and over to my right view, i noticed a reddish light/orb hovering in the sky within 500 feet from my car. it just just above tree top. it caught my eye immediately and i thought to myself "they didn't put a cell phone tower there.. what the heck is that?" it was approx that height of a smaller tower. but as i got closer to the light, it stayed hovering, still, no movement. i started to slow my car down to approx 10mph and while looking at it closer, i noticed a reddish type of light that had a different look to it almost as if a candlelight warmth glow. but underneath the red light appeared to have a white glowing light. almost as if they were the same light.. top side red, underneath white. as i'm driving slowly, south bound, i noticed an  suv parked on a side road watching this light as well. she was parked facing east and the light was to her left side. i drive about 100 ft and turn around to face north bound to watch this light.. during that 10 sec of me turning around, the light moved about 2000 ft due west from the original hovering spot. i'm watching this light and notice the person in the suv sped off quickly. i wave to stop her to talk about the sighting but she drives off and she looked to be upset. my eyes turn back to this light and within a fraction of a second, the light took off at the most unimaginable speed that i have ever seen. it looked to have taken off northwest. i sped home, upset, chills with an uneased eerie feeling. i don't know if i can sleep tonight.  i feel the need to report this immediately.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering reddish orb with white glowing dome like light

content.detailedDescription: I dont know what to make of this object.
content.summary: Ufo hovering in a lunar crater

content.detailedDescription: We were boating after sunset on pawtuckaway lake. stars were becoming visible in much of the sky. we were turned towards the east and saw a large orange ball rise over the tree lines. it pulsated. it had no additional lights. it was just a large circle, much larger, brighter, more orange than any traditional aircraft. we killed the boats engine to listen and it was silent. it crossed south to north in front of us and every adult on the boat was confused by it's lack of identifying lights, shapes or sounds. it went fairly slow for something that seemed lower, like the height of a helicopter. the light appeared to grow brighter ad then weaker. then it disappeared right in the middle of the sky. like someone turned the light out. it flickered out. entire duration 3 to 4 minutes. it was too close and too big to be silent.
content.summary: Glowing silent orange ball of light over pawtuckaway lake that travels then disappears.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving from tucson to phoenix on i-10 early sunday morning july 8, 2012. we were about 60 miles from phoenix when at 4:19am i observed an object with between 6-8 white lights horizontally aligned and about 45 feet above i-10 coming directly at me. it was about 100 yards ahead of me. i at first thought it was an overpass but quickly observed it moving directly toward me. i asked my wife "what is that" and when it was about 20 feet in front of me it made an almost 90 degree turn to my left and went toward a plowed field. i asked my wife to follow it but she said it had disapeared. for a few minutes i thought it was an airplane. then i realized there was absolutely no sound.
content.summary: Horizontal lights (6-8) about 45 ' off ground over i-10

content.detailedDescription: It was amazing,i stepped on to the beach with girl friend and dog for a walk and looked up and seen one of them then a second, red and orange glowing light, amazing, she did not want to talk about it at first want to think a bit about it first....Amazing
content.summary: Two red and orange craft. over the sound in westbrook off the beach about 300-500 ft very strange.Was thinking a plane til it changed direction and was allowed by a second ever closer and more amazing.Wow
